statements: SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT training_title, employee_name, training_duration_hours FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT training_title, training_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE training_duration_hours >= 4;
SELECT employee_name, completion_status FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT training_title, training_date, employee_name FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE training_duration_hours > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, employee_name FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT training_title, training_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(training_duration_hours) AS average_duration, MAX(training_duration_hours) AS max_duration, MIN(training_duration_hours) AS min_duration FROM RegulatoryComplianceTrainingRecords;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT training_type, training_date FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT employee_id, training_type, training_date FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records WHERE training_type = 'Safety Training';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT training_type, COUNT(*) AS total_trainings FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records GROUP BY training_type;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee_records WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_type FROM employee_records JOIN regulatory_compliance_training_records ON employee_records.employee_id = regulatory_compliance_training_records.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT employee_name, training_date FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, training_date, completion_status FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT course_name, LENGTH(course_description) AS description_length FROM training_courses ORDER BY description_length DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance')
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT employee_id, completion_date, training_type FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, completion_date, training_type, training_status FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, last_name, department FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name;
SELECT module_id, module_name, total_duration_hours FROM training_modules WHERE total_duration_hours > 10;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM training_modules WHERE total_duration_hours > 10;
SELECT employee_id, training_module_id, completion_date FROM regulatory_compliance_training_records WHERE training_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_training_records ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_type FROM regulatory_training_records WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM training_courses WHERE instructor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM training_employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT course_id, start_date, end_date FROM training_schedule ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_training_records;
SELECT employee_name, training_type, completion_date FROM regulatory_training_records WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM training_employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM training_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT employee_name, course_name, completion_date, passed FROM regulatory_training_records JOIN completed_trainings ON regulatory_training_records.record_id = completed_trainings.record_id JOIN training_courses ON completed_trainings.course_id = training_courses.course_id;
